Raceways/Trunking Tray & Accessories In Nepal


Raceways/Trunking


Raceways are a reasonable method to run systems administration and force cables all through IT Companies. We are one of the best Cable Tray Manufacturer in Nepal . All our products are made from the best quality materials which makes them durable and provides a good customer experience.
Standard Length - 2500mm.
Thickness - 1.2mm to 3mm.
Height - 30mm,40mm,50mm, 75mm and 100mm.
Width - 40mm,50mm,75mm, 100mm,150mm, 300mm,450mm,600mm,750mm and 1000mm.
Finish - GI Hot dip, Pre-Galvanised as per IS-277, Powder Coated and SS-202/304/316.

FAQ:

A: Raceways generally mount on a wall in a room where power and communications cables are terminated. raceways are protection wires and cables from heat, humidity, corrosion, water intrusion and general physical threats.
A: Types of Cable Tray
  • Raceways/ Trucking
  • Junction Box
  • Unistrut
  • Z Channel
  • C’ Channel
  • Reducer
    • A: Cable tray is classified by the NEC (NFPA 70 the National Electrical Code) as a support system and not as a raceway. Generally speaking raceway completely encloses the cable inside of it.
